column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Alina - Thanks for the 5-star review! I'm very pleased to know you enjoyed your dining experience with us. You're pretty spot-on in your description of our Spicy Chicken Ramen ("spicy" level). JINYA franchises are popping up all over the U.S.
column2: so chances are fairly good there might be opening near to where you live in the future! But please come back to visit us if you're ever in Houston again.
